senses.sense_definition: A small portable container, often made of horn, used to carry ink.

examples.text: The scribe dipped his quill into the <w>inkhorn</w> hanging from his belt.
She admired the antique <w>inkhorn</w> displayed in the museum case.

senses.sense_definition: Something or someone pedantic or obscurely scholarly; often used to describe pretentious vocabulary.

examples.text: The author was criticized for using an <w>inkhorn</w> term instead of a simple English word.
His speech was filled with <w>inkhorn</w> language that confused the audience.

traits.comment: mostly used attributively in historical contexts
